# type

**Instance Property**

The type of action to trigger when the alarm fires.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: EKAlarmType { get }
```

## Discussion

To set the type of alarm, define one of [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/emailAddress], [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/soundName], or [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/url].

## Triggering Alarm Actions

- **EKAlarmType**: A value that specifies what type of action occurs when the alarm triggers.
- **emailAddress**: The recipient of an email to send when the alarm triggers.
- **soundName**: The name of the sound to play when the alarm triggers.
